page.title: 05HAVEN BANKS SAILING CENTRE
page.content: Haven Banks teaches people to canoe and sail. The centre is situated in the middle of Exeter between the river and the canal. It has been open for about 12 years. It is not profit making and is owned by Devon County Council. There are one fulltime and ten to fifteen parttime staff. The centre has thirty kayaks and a few special dinghies, one windsurfer and one rescue boat. Also the centre provides buoyancy aids and life jackets. Any age group can use the centre but you must be able to swim 50 metres. Disabled people can be accommodated. During the school term the centre is mainly used for schools but the general public can also take part. It is open from 9.00am. to 9.00pm. six days a week. Last year 6000 people attended the centre.
